title: Hey!, this a message for all the pet owners out there
selftext:
Hey! We're a group of students, we would really appreciate it if you could take out a moment to help us collect information for our school project.
PawParents is our vision for creating an ideal environment for you and your pets.
Here's the link to the survey, we would highly appreciate your input:

https://forms.gle/5191mLJ3wf5MGF2y5
